      • findPlayer

        public Player findPlayer(java.lang.String s_name)
                  throws PlayerNotFoundException
        checks whether a certain player is connected to the server and if so return the name

        returns null if none was found

        Parameters:
        s_name - the pleayer's name you're looking for
        Returns:
        the player or null if no such player was found
        Throws:
        PlayerNotFoundException - if a Player with the specified nick can't be found

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
        Returns a !!READ ONLY!! list of all players on the server
        Returns:
        the list of all connected players

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(Player p_Player)
        Add a Player to the PlayerManager. This is automatically done when you create a new Player!
        Parameters:
        p_Player - the player

      • findUUID

        public Player findUUID(java.lang.String s_PlayerID)
                throws PlayerNotFoundException
        checks whether a player with a certain UUID can be found. returns null if nothing was found.
        Parameters:
        s_PlayerID - the player UUID
        Returns:
        the corresponding player
        Throws:
        PlayerNotFoundException - if now Player can be found matching the specified UUID

      • reserveID

        public int reserveID()
              throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Returns a PlayerID that remains allocated until the player quits
        Returns:
        the playerID
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the server is full
